query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS patient_progress_tracking (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  assessment_id INT,
  tracking_date DATE NOT NULL,
  symptoms_data JSON NOT NULL,
  overall_wellness_score INT,
  sleep_hours DECIMAL(3,1),
  stress_level INT,
  exercise_minutes INT,
  water_intake_oz INT,
  protocol_id INT,
  adherence_percentage INT,
  adherence_notes TEXT,
  patient_notes TEXT,
  provider_notes TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  FOREIGN KEY (protocol_id) REFERENCES treatment_protocols(id) ON DELETE SET NULL,
  INDEX idx_user_tracking (user_id, tracking_date)
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2bdzn41uM6mMWcv.97707ddd6929 --database 3gcYftfyZmb2335Uoynmho --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS patient_progress_tracking (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  assessment_id INT,
  tracking_date DATE NOT NULL,
  symptoms_data JSON NOT NULL,
  overall_wellness_score INT,
  sleep_hours DECIMAL(3,1),
  stress_level INT,
  exercise_minutes INT,
  water_intake_oz INT,
  protocol_id INT,
  adherence_percentage INT,
  adherence_notes TEXT,
  patient_notes TEXT,
  provider_notes TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  FOREIGN KEY (protocol_id) REFERENCES treatment_protocols(id) ON DELETE SET NULL,
  INDEX idx_user_tracking (user_id, tracking_date)
)
